data.value:
Chess Puzzle Simulator Software License Agreement
Effective Date: 01/05/2025
Introduction This Software License Agreement (“Agreement”) is a legal agreement between you (either an individual or a single entity, hereinafter referred to as “You” or “Licensee”) and Dustin Miller (“Owner”) for the use of the software product titled Chess Puzzle Simulator (“Software”). By installing, copying, or otherwise using the Software, You agree to be bound by the terms of this Agreement.
Grant of License
Free Use: The Software is provided to You at no cost.
Scope: Subject to the terms of this Agreement, the Owner grants You a non-exclusive, non-transferable license to install and use the Software on any number of personal or business computers for Your own use.
Restrictions: You shall not: Modify, adapt, translate, reverse engineer, decompile, or disassemble the Software (except to the extent applicable law expressly permits such actions, despite this limitation). Sell, resell, rent, lease, or otherwise transfer rights to the Software. Remove, alter, or obscure any proprietary notices (including copyright and trademark notices) on or in the Software. Ownership and Intellectual Property
Ownership: The Software, including but not limited to its code, documentation, appearance, structure, and organization, is an exclusive product of Dustin Miller. All rights not expressly granted in this Agreement are reserved by the Owner. Copyright: The Software is protected by copyright and other intellectual property laws. Unauthorized use or distribution may result in civil and/or criminal penalties. No Warranty
As Is: The Software is provided “AS IS,” with all faults and without warranty of any kind. The Owner disclaims all warranties, express or implied, including but not limited to implied warranties of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, and non-infringement. No Guarantee: The Owner does not guarantee that the Software will meet Your requirements or that its operation will be uninterrupted or error-free. Limitation of Liability
Exclusion: To the fullest extent permitted by law, in no event shall the Owner be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, consequential, special, or punitive damages, or damages for loss of profits, revenue, data, or data use, incurred by You or any third party, arising from or related to the use of the Software. Maximum Liability: In no event shall the Owner’s total liability for all damages exceed the amount of [U.S. $0.00] (zero dollars), given that the Software is provided free of charge. Termination
Termination by You: You may terminate this Agreement at any time by discontinuing use of the Software and destroying all copies in Your possession or control. Termination by Owner: The Owner may terminate this Agreement if You fail to comply with any terms and conditions of this Agreement. Upon termination, You must stop using and destroy all copies of the Software. Governing Law This Agreement shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of [Your Jurisdiction], without regard to conflict of law principles. The courts located within [Your Jurisdiction] shall have exclusive jurisdiction to resolve any disputes arising out of or relating to this Agreement.
Entire Agreement This Agreement constitutes the entire understanding between You and the Owner concerning the subject matter herein and supersedes all prior discussions, agreements, and understandings. No amendment or modification of this Agreement will be binding unless in writing and signed by the Owner.
Contact Information If You have any questions about this Agreement or the Software, please contact:
Owner: Dustin Miller Email: chesstools.net@gmail.com
BY INSTALLING OR USING THE SOFTWARE, YOU ACKNOWLEDGE THAT YOU HAVE READ THIS AGREEMENT, UNDERSTAND IT, AND AGREE TO BE BOUND BY ITS TERMS AND CONDITIONS.
